revised_title: An Analysis of Megakaryocyte Development in Rat Bone Marrow
tldr: The study investigates the development of megakaryocytes in rat bone marrow using electron microscopy and high-resolution autoradiography. The researchers found three main types of immature megakaryocytes, with varying nuclear lobes and cytoplasmic characteristics. The findings suggest that megakaryocytes possess a lobulated nucleus and show cytoplasmic differentiation from the time of their first endomitosis.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
